name: you can do with two people basket Game
name_original: you can do with two people basket Game
description:
Game type basket game you can do with two people

Can play up to two people in one single iphone.

Easy operation
---
Move swipe.
Shoot in the tap.
---

※it is too fun, with care so as not to quarrel with my friends.


1. "Start" button to see the description page
2. Move player to pull [●]
3. When you become close to the goal, shoot by clicking on the [●]
4. Victory or defeat is determined by 3 minutes.

You can see from the video below.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ROYHiP6f2Zk&feature=youtu.be
